Package lcm.java.swing

package lcm.java.swing
  • Class
    Description
    CustomFont
    Class to handle fonts in Swing.
    CustomFont.Style
    Enum representing font styles.
    RelativeLayout
    The RelativeLayout class is a layout manager that lays out a container's components on the specified X or Y axis.
    RelativeLayout.Axis
    Enum representing layout axis.
    Screen
    Helper class for dealing with screen/monitor properties.
    SwingComponents
    Helper class for building and manipulating various complex Swing components.
    SystemTrayFrame
    A specialization of JFrame to be accessible from the system tray.
    TextWidget
    Class for creating text widgets (invisible frames that only display a text in system tray).
    Toast
    Class for making a Toast with Swing.
